text: Drama in the Futurists' Cabaret No. 13 () is a 1914 Russian silent drama movie directed by Vladimir Kasyanov.Цветы на лице It stars Vsevolod Maksimovich, David Burliuk, and Vladimir Burliuk. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1914 drama movies
title: Drama in the Futurists' Cabaret No. 13
